title: 조동사 + 수동태
description: must, should, could 등 조동사와 결합한 수동태 표현을 연습합니다.
examples: This issue must be resolved immediately.
The report should be submitted by tomorrow.
The system could be upgraded next year.

sentences.en: This issue must be resolved immediately.
The report should be submitted by tomorrow.
The system could be upgraded next year.
All data must be encrypted for security.
The new policy should be explained to employees.

sentences.kr: 이 정보는 외부에 공개되면 안 됩니다.
sentences.en: This information should not be disclosed externally.

sentences.kr: 제품이 더 많은 시장에서 판매될 수 있습니다.
sentences.en: The product could be sold in more markets.

sentences.kr: 회의가 다음 주로 연기될 것 같습니다.
sentences.en: The meeting might be postponed to next week.
